videotemplate_discussion_question3::eval: Does your story tell us why the issue is important?
videotemplate_discussion_question3::clip: Show a place important to the event.
videotemplate_discussion_question3::text: Talk to different people for each clip to give your story a range of voices. You may want to substitute the name of the issue you are focused on where you see \“the issue.\”
videotemplate_discussion_question3::clip: Show us something that represents the event.
videotemplate_discussion_question3::text: If you get a bad answer, feel free to ask again in a new clip, or find someone else.

Discussions are framed around asking many people the same question. This template examines the importance of a single event. Discussions work well for introducing events with a strong cultural or social significance. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
